sentences.en: A meeting , however, is unavoidable and proves awkward.
sentences.cn: 然而, 碰头总是不可避免的,结果彼此都很尴尬.

sentences.en: As spans increase this will become unavoidable for the internal rooms.
sentences.cn: 随着跨度的增加,这种做法对于内部房间是势在必行的.

sentences.en: Be not disturbed at trifles, or at accidents common or unavoidable.
sentences.cn: 不为区区琐事, 或寻常事故,或难免之事,自寻烦恼.

sentences.en: Being unavoidable that man is incorrect.
Fender - benders are unavoidable in Taipei, even when your car is parked.
sentences.cn: 在台北, 即使车子停靠在路边,小小擦撞依然不可避免.

sentences.en: Managers said the job losses were unavoidable.
sentences.cn: 经理们说裁员是不可避免的。

sentences.en: Many unavoidable random spots are always present in the film.
sentences.cn: 乳胶上免不了会有许多乱七八糟的斑点.

sentences.en: She sees exercise primarily as an unavoidable chore.
sentences.cn: 她基本上把锻炼看做是不得不做的琐事。
有些错误是无法避免的.

sentences.en: The recession has resulted in an unavoidable increase in spending on unemployment benefit.
sentences.cn: 经济萧条导致失业救济金的支出不可避免地增加。

sentences.en: There are now fears that war is unavoidable.
sentences.cn: 人们现在担心战争不可避免。

sentences.en: Unavoidable things which, while she didn't relish them, had to be endured.
sentences.cn: 她认为这是无可避免的事, 虽然自己不见得就愿意它来, 但是来了也只好忍受.

sentences.en: Under the circumstances, a crash was unavoidable.
sentences.cn: 在那种情况下，撞车是难以避免的。

sentences.en: We explain to everybody that the delay is unavoidable.
sentences.cn: 我们向大家解释延迟是不可避免的.

sentences.en: We were miserably juggling witn the unavoidable.
sentences.cn: 我们可怜地同不可避免的命运捉迷藏.

trans.tran_cn: 不可避免的，不得已的，不能废除的，不能废除的，不能取消的，必不可免，不免
